name: Wantr
subtitle: The Wandering Trader
description: Explore your city, discover streets, and build your trading empire. A location-based game where walking reveals the map.

apps.name: Wantr
apps.subtitle: Discover streets, build outposts
apps.localizedDescription:
Wantr is a location-based exploration game where you discover streets as you walk. Watch the fog of war clear as you explore your neighborhood!

Features:
• Real-time GPS tracking
• OpenStreetMap integration
• Fog of war discovery
• Team play with friends
• Offline support

versions.localizedDescription:
Initial release:
• Map exploration with fog of war
• 15m reveal radius
• Google Sign-In
• Team creation and joining
• OSM street data

privacy.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Wantr uses your location to track which streets you've discovered.
privacy.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: Wantr uses your location in the background to continue tracking your exploration.
